author: ELEKCO XDPLAYERXD
comment: The only App, which can show me the route with train changes which. It helps me very much, but I wish me a Desktop Version. I have found a website from you, but without a webview of Ally.

author: Peter Liddiard
comment: Used it for a week and it was great then it abruptly stopped working saying 'outside covered area', for all searches. Can't figure out why.

author: Christian Kuhna
comment: All results show "outside of covered area" doesn't work anymore...

author: Andy Jones
comment: Tried this around Berlin, the app worked ok but didn't always find the most direct routes and also displayed routes/services that weren't available. Ended up using a public transport map combined with Google maps instead.

reply.author: door2door
reply.content: Hi Andy! Thanks so much for your feedback. It is important to us that we can always provide you the best results possible. If you would give us another chance, it would be wonderful if you could let us know issues with exact routes via the feedback button in the app. You can help us improve the routes for everyone! :) Thanks again for trying us out

title: Not the best

author: Vladimir Glusac Rill
comment: I take different types of transportation depending on my mood and weather conditions and this is exactly what I needed. Suggestion: add more local services e.g. Hailo in London

reply.author: door2door
reply.content: Hallo Vladimir! Thanks so much for your kind words! I'll send this feedback on to our product team and if you have any more suggestions, please don't hesitate to write us at help@allyapp.com.

title: Just the thing i needed

author: Mohamed Fathy
comment: For 4 months ally was my guide during my stay in Nordrhein-Westfalen i was basically living in dusseldorf at this period but during weekends i was traveling a lot around the state and ally never let me down bonn, Dortmund, Bochum, Oberhausen, Essen etc all was covered by ally thanks for making this product
title: Was my companion in Nordrhein-Westfalen

author: Aria Bisma
comment: I used tu use Metro by Naninka on Palm.  Never found its replacement since they stop development.  This is much more better replacement because its global coverage.  Love it.

reply.author: door2door
reply.content: Hi there Aria! Thanks so much for your kind words! We hope you continue enjoying the app and know that you can always write us at help@allyapp.com if you have any comments for us!

author: Sebastian K
comment: Compared to older versions there are a lot improvements. Now in Frankfurt Main there are shown all available connections properly. Thanks to developers! ADDITION: After a while of using this app i realized that there is no real-time update of departure times. in public traffic in Germany there is a lot of delays. it makes this app a bit useless. öffi is still better. sorry

reply.author: door2door
reply.content:
Hey Sebastian! We are so happy to see that we managed to improve the service in your city and you appreciated it :)
Have a nice day,
Ally Team
